headline.subtitle: Grow your student base, lead with innovation
headline.description: The GATACA technology enables the higher education sector to maintain their competitive edge by increasing student, staff, and partner experience with digital processes and transactions.

theResult.head: The result
theResult.title: Transform student & staff experiences and generate new opportunities for the entire ecosystem
theResult.description: With GATACA, Universities can spur digital transformation in the their whole ecosystem. Indirect partners such as healthcare services and rental buildings can leverage SSI technology to streamline student applications and increase conversion rates

bullets.title: Academic fraud & complex verification processes
bullets.subtitle: Costly regulation compliance, lack of citizen eID adoption, and identity fraud.
bullets.description: To reduce academic fraud, Universities follow time & resource consuming processes to verify student identities and certifications (diplomas, transcripts, etc). Meanwhile, students and alumni engage in complex application processes for programs and jobs, often not completing them because of missing documents, outdated information and negative user experiences.

bullets.title: Academic verifiable credentials: easy to issue & share, always up-to-date
bullets.description: With our technology, University staff operations flow seamlessly. Universities can securely issue, updated, and verify digital academic credentials such as diplomas, transcripts, and student IDs. From their digital Wallet, students use these credentials to apply for jobs and programs, in seconds, while alleviating the burden of paperwork for verifiers.

transformBulletsSection.title: Putting universities at the front end of digital innovation
transformBulletsSection.description: The first credential use cases for self-sovereign identity have been established in the education sector, yet there's more to come.

textBullets.text: Students request their eduactional institution to issue their digital academic diploma via the insititution’s website
The institution verifies the student’s identity by requesting access to the necessary identity credentials on their Wallet.
Once verified, the credential is instantly & automatically downloaded on the student’s Wallet
The student uses their credentials to apply or access any digital service
